com.zycus.pm.api
Interface IPermissionRights

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPermissionRights
public interface IPermissionRights
extends java.io.Serializable

This will be used for checking whether and BaseRight is allowed for one IPermissionEntity and IPermisibleResource. This class will internally call IPermissionResolver.isRightPermitted(BaseRight, IPermissionEntity, IPermisibleResource) to finally resolve.

Since:
: Apr 29, 2009 : 1:32:03 PM
Author:
Aniruddha Dutta Chowdhury

Method Summary
 boolean isRightPermitted(BaseRight right)
          This will call the IPermissionResolver internally and will return the return value from the IPermissionResolver.isRightPermitted(BaseRight, IPermissionEntity, IPermisibleResource)
 

Method Detail

isRightPermitted

boolean isRightPermitted(BaseRight right)
This will call the IPermissionResolver internally and will return the return value from the IPermissionResolver.isRightPermitted(BaseRight, IPermissionEntity, IPermisibleResource)

Parameters:
right - is BaseRight for which allowed or denied to be checked
Returns:
true if the BaseRight is allowed false otherwise
